trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkElementAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkElementAutomationPeer"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that uniquely identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得可唯一識別字串<xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement"></xref>與此相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the automation identifier is the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A> property, and if that isn't set, it's the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 自動化識別項的值是<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A>屬性，以及如果您未設定的它是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A>

trans-unit.source: The automation identifier for the element associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkElementAutomationPeer"></xref>, or <xref:System.String.Empty> if there isn't an automation identifier.
trans-unit.target: 自動化識別項與相關聯的項目<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>，或<xref:System.String.Empty>如果沒有自動化識別項。</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that describes the functionality of the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得描述的功能的字串<xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref>與此相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The help text, usually from the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"></xref>, or <xref:System.String.Empty> if there is no help text.
trans-unit.target: 說明文字通常是從<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"> </xref>，或<xref:System.String.Empty>如果沒有任何說明文字。</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: Gets the text label of the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得的文字標籤<xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref>與此相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The name property can be thought of as the string of text that a user would use to explain which control is being referred to.
trans-unit.target: Name 屬性可以視為的使用者可以用來說明所參考的控制項的文字字串。

trans-unit.source: It is important to have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: 請務必中所有控制項的文字表示[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]，您可以透過程式設計方式，以當地語系化的方式參考控制項。

trans-unit.source: The text label of the element that is associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 與此 automation peer 相關聯之項目的文字標籤。
